input_query:
You plan to visit 6 European cities for 17 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You want to spend 4 days in Bucharest. You want to spend 4 days in Athens. You would like to meet your friends at Athens between day 5 and day 8 to tour together. You plan to stay in Oslo for 5 days. You plan to visit relatives in Oslo between day 8 and day 12. You want to spend 3 days in Florence. You would like to visit Munich for 3 days. You would like to visit Warsaw for 3 days. You are going to attend a wedding in Warsaw between day 12 and day 14.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Athens and Warsaw, Warsaw and Bucharest, from Florence to Munich, Munich and Bucharest, Munich and Athens, Munich and Warsaw, Munich and Oslo, Oslo and Warsaw, Oslo and Bucharest, Athens and Oslo, Athens and Bucharest.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 17 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
